instruction: any good funny mystery movies with clever detectives?
output: You’ve got to check out Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery! 🕵️‍♂️ It’s full of twists, laughs, and a super clever detective solving a wild case in Greece. Perfect if you love a good brain teaser with a side of comedy! 😂🔍

instruction: looking for a fun crime movie set somewhere cool
